Package smeen.logic

Class CodeExecutionHandler

java.lang.Object
smeen.logic.CodeExecutionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasEvents
public class CodeExecutionHandler extends Object implements HasEvents
A class that handle code blocks execution.
